\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}

\makeatletter

\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}

\makeatother


\begin{document}


\begin{tikzpicture}
  \tikzstyle{hollow node}=[circle,draw,inner sep=1.5];
  \tikzstyle{solid node}=[circle,draw,inner sep=1.5,fill=black];
  \tikzset{
    red node/.style={circle,draw=red,inner sep=1.2,fill=red},
    blue node/.style={circle,draw=blue,inner sep=1.2,fill=blue}
    }
  \node(0)[hollow node]{}
child[sibling distance=60mm]{node[red node]{} edge from parent[red] 
 {
   child[sibling distance=30mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[black]
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[black]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[black]
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[right,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         node[left,black]{$1$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[right,black]{$0$}}
     node[left,black,xshift=-3]{$\lambda$}}
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[black]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$\pi^\ast$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[black]{$1-\pi^\ast$}}
     node[right,black]{$1-\lambda$}}
   node[left,black]{$1$}}
   child[sibling distance=30mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[red]
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[red]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[red] node[left,black]{$1$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[black]
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[right,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         node[right,black]{$0$}}
     node[left,black,xshift=-3]{$\lambda$}}
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[black]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$\pi^\ast$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[black]{$1-\pi^\ast$}}
     node[right,black]{$1-\lambda$}}
   node[right,black]{$0$}}
 }
node[left,black,xshift=-3]{$\lambda$}}
child[sibling distance=60mm]{node[red node]{} edge from parent[green] 
 {
   child[sibling distance=30mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[black]
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[black]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$1$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[right,black]{$0$}}
     node[left,black,xshift=-3]{$\lambda$}}
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[black]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[black]
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[left,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[right,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         node[left,black]{$\pi^\ast$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[black] node[black]{$1-\pi^\ast$}}
     node[right,black]{$1-\lambda$}}
     node[left,black]{$\pi^\ast$}
   } 
   child[sibling distance=30mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[green]
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[green]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[green] node[left,black]{$1$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[green] node[right,black]{$0$}}
       node[left,black,xshift=-3]{$\lambda$}
     }
     child[sibling distance=15mm]{node[blue node]{} edge from parent[green]
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[green] node[left,black]{$\pi^\ast$}}
       child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[hollow node]{} edge from parent[green] 
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$1$}]{} edge from parent[green] node[left,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         child[sibling distance=10mm]{node[solid node,label=below:{$0$}]{} edge from parent[green] node[right,black]{$\frac{1}{2}$}}
         node[black]{$1-\pi^\ast$}
       }
       node[right,black]{$1-\lambda$}
     }
     node[right,black]{$1-\pi^\ast$}
   }
 }
node[right,black]{$1-\lambda$}};
\node[above]at(0){Nature};
\end{tikzpicture}
